item.title: Derek add a quote by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle
item.description: " "I am afraid that I rather give myself away when I explain," said he. "Results without causes are much more impressive." -- Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

item.title: Derek add a quote by Lindsey A. Holcomb, Justin S. Holcomb
item.description: "Grace is love that seeks you out even if you have nothing to give in return. Grace is being loved when you are or feel unlovable. Grace has the power to turn despair into hope. Grace listens, lifts up, cures, transforms, and heals." -- Lindsey A. Holcomb, Justin S. Holcomb

item.title: Derek add a quote by Lindsey A. Holcomb, Justin S. Holcomb
item.description: "A good short definition of grace is “one-way love." -- Lindsey A. Holcomb, Justin S. Holcomb

item.title: Derek add a quote by Lindsey A. Holcomb
item.description: "Sin and the effects of sin are similar to the laws of inertia: a person (or object) in motion will continue on that trajectory until acted upon by an outside force." -- Lindsey A. Holcomb

item.title: Derek add a quote by Lindsey A. Holcomb, Justin S. Holcomb
item.description: "destruction—the vandalism of shalom." -- Lindsey A. Holcomb, Justin S. Holcomb

item.title: Derek add a quote by Lindsey A. Holcomb
item.description: "We are all powerless to heal ourselves. Research shows that self-help statements have been found to be ineffective and even harmful by making some people with low self-esteem feel even worse about themselves in the long term.39 As a matter of fact, positive self-statements frequently end up reinforcing and strengthening one’s original negative self-perception they were trying to change.40" -- Lindsey A. Holcomb
